OOC: last post by now I have a tournament tomorrow and I gtg.

Kali::

Kali was watching what Blaze had done in the control room "Fool" 
Thought the femme. She typed  some buttons in order to block at Blaze 
the access to the computer. She typed some buttons more and eight 
mechanical craws appeared and took each leg and wrists of the femmes 
in order to that they couldn't do anything against her plans.

She typed some buttons and a sort of gun appeared. This gun shot 3 
darts to each femme that would do them sleep a long time.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Blaze looked back toward Silver Scout, "They know we're here." she 
smelled
> the gas, "I could reopen the doors but we don't know what's on the 
other
> side." she thought fast. "Well Shivah let's play for a while." 
useing her
> advanced computer knowledge she accessed the gas control and shut 
off the
> valve to the room, and sent a false signal that the gas was still 
running.
> "Lets see how you like it." typeing in more codes she opened a 
valve near
> the terminal where Kali was. Again she turned to Silver Scout. "Lay 
down and
> close your eyes." Transforming to tigress she layed down and did 
the same.
> 
> "Oh I see." Silver Scout replied, "Join the Predacons, learn to 
play dead."
> she lay down on her side near the far wall and closed her eyes as 
she was
> instructed.
